q1: Where can I place the page numbers?
a1: You can place page numbers in six positions: bottom center, bottom left, bottom right, top center, top left, or top right.
a2: Yes! Choose from simple numbers (1, 2, 3), fraction format (1/N), or 'Page X' and 'Page X of N' formats. You can also set the starting number and font size.
a3: All processing happens in your browser using pdf-lib. Your files never leave your device.
